alert.note: Alert for Brown; Door; Kewaunee; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 1:47PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts to impact far northeast Wisconsin... At 145 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph along a line extending from 7 miles west of Oconto to near Bay Shore Park to 8 miles north of Manitowoc. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bay Shore Park and Oconto around 150 PM CDT. Marinette and Kewaunee around 205 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Algoma, Egg Harbor, Jacksonport and Newport State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Door; Kewaunee; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
